metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5094 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable code execution vulnerability exists in the quota file functionality of E2fsprogs 1.45.3. A specially crafted ext4 partition can cause an out-of-bounds write on the heap, resulting in code execution. An attacker can corrupt a partition to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: e2fsprogs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
